title: Massive Razer sales can save you up to $500 on Blade gaming laptops and 50% on accessories
author: tabitha-baker
article: Razer's latest PC gaming sales are offering big discounts on Blade gaming laptop deals and some excellent savings on accessories as well. While these are certainly still pricey rigs, you'll find 144Hz refresh rates, RTX GPUs, and speedy i7 processor for as much as $500 off right now - and you're getting a free Hitman gaming bundle worth $100 as well.

Our top pick is this $400 saving on the Razer Blade 15 Base edition (was $1,999, now $1,599). With RTX 2070 Max-Q graphics you're getting a slightly more future proof GPU over the $1,499 RTX 2060 configuration, and picking up a hexacore 10th gen i7 processor, 16GB RAM and 512GB of SSD storage. Those are some impressive specs, especially considering everything will run buttery smooth on that 144Hz panel as well.
You can also save 50% on the Razer Raiju Mobile controller as well, now down to $74.99 (was $149.99), and score a Razer Viper gaming mouse for just $59.99 as well.
However, before you dive into these Razer deals below, it's worth noting that applying promo code CHROMANIA at checkout will net you a mysterious free gift on orders over $129 as well.
